markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flexible Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=3945) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 37</row>

**Prerequisites**
any heritage except [strong oak](/Heritages.aspx?ID=209)

</column>

---

Your body is as supple as a sapling, capable of bending without breaking. You become trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1), and if you roll a success to [Squeeze](/Actions.aspx?ID=31), you get a critical success instead. If you would automatically become trained in Acrobatics (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.
name: Flexible Form
